@dragonfrend123
Try putting the .jar in a separate folder / deleting older ftb related folders, files / launching it again after it has downloaded everything
thanks for uploading this...it's such a pain when modpack authors do this.

okay, I ran it in a fresh folder and it didn't run.  I did find a work around though.  All you have to do is get the modpack files then put them in a fresh .minecraft folder, 1.4.2 minecraft of course.  Then you take the forge.zip and put the files into the minecraft.jar file.
